title: How to draw the Free body diagram of the following wedge - Quora

response.answer_text: A free body diagram shows a body as a particle and all forces as vectors acting on that particle.  Some tips: 1. Draw the f.b.d. of the body isolated from other bodies on contact 2. Indicate first the weight, line passing through C.G. of body, acting vertically downward. 3. Other bodies in context with the body under consideration, generally exert reactions normal to the surfaces of contact.(In case of a plank, hinged at some point in a wall, reaction is not normal to the contact surface.
